alert.note: Alert for Letcher; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Letcher and southwestern Pike Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beefhide, or 10 miles northwest of Clintwood. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... McRoberts, Beefhide and Shelby Gap around 615 PM EDT. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... U.S. Highway 23 in Lethcher County between mile markers 1 and 7. U.S. Highway 23 in Pike County between mile markers 0 and 6, and between mile markers 8 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
